title: The Cub scout in the den
creator_credit: Boy Scouts of America. Visual Education Service
brief_description: Shows a typical cub Den in operation including the procedure of a Den meeting. Illustrates the roles played by Den Mother, Den Dad, Den Chief and Denner. Shows how the monthly theme is worked into the Den meeting program and how typical “disciplinary” problems are correctly handled.
